scripts.build: dotnet fable src -o build/client --run vite build
scripts.start: dotnet fable watch src -s -o build/client --run vite
scripts.test: dotnet fable test -o build/test --run web-test-runner build/test/*Test.js --node-resolve
scripts.test:watch: dotnet fable watch test -o build/test --run web-test-runner build/test/*Test.js --node-resolve --watch
scripts.publish: npm test && npm run build -- --base=/Lit.TodoMVC/ && npx gh-pages -d dist
